column4: if it has vanished from the gnome window list, it's probably not in a useful state now. If it was my system, I'd kill that program.
It is still working though. :) It's a bot and still responding to commands.
I see, so it's detached and doesn't have a window. Is there any problem with it then?
I jsut tweaked wine a bit, and am wondering if I messed it up, I'm going to ask in wine also, but figure it is more of a gnome thing.
